description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Nha Trang, Vietnam. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Extended by Popular Demand: Central Nha Trang Splendour with Daily Breakfast, Cocktails & Transfers
hotels.description: Discover a blend of old-world Vietnamese opulence, touches of striking Indochine style and modern luxury at this five-star sanctuary. Among Nha Trang's dazzling array of world-class marketplaces, restaurants and nightlife, just a block from the emerald waters of Nha Trang Bay, this hotel is the perfect base to explore Vietnam's golden beaches, diving spots and idyllic offshore islands. Whether it's laid-back beachside bliss or unforgettable evenings, Potique Hotel promises the best of both worlds. Enjoy panoramic views while sipping a refreshing local beer at the rooftop Blue Bar, visit Nha Trang Restaurant for indulgent Vietnamese fare or indulge in fresh ingredients and unique cooking styles at Indochine Restaurant. Spend your afternoons splashing in the iridescent infinity pool or experiencing Nha Trang's countless treasures, including the nearby Agarwood Tower and Khanh Hoa Museum.

hotels.vendor_name: InterContinental Residences Nha Trang (formally Costa Executive Residences)
hotels.title: Five-Star Vietnam Self-Catering Apartments Overlooking Nha Trang Bay
hotels.description: Shouldered by mountain ranges and sitting above the sparkling bay, InterContinental Residences Nha Trang is the perfect base for exploring Nha Trang. Cool off under the Vietnam sun on the pool deck, dipping in and out of the glistening pool, or take a leisurely walk to the nearby beach and soak up Nha Trang Bay vistas. Taste ocean-fresh seafood at nearby restaurants and stretch your muscles at the fitness centre, all on your doorstep.

hotels.title: Top-Rated Five-Star Vietnam Hotel with Rooftop Bar
hotels.description: Step into a world of sophisticated beauty when you enter the elegant lobby of Vietnam's five-star Potique Nha Trang. Take the time to discover the sun-kissed lifestyle of this thriving coastal paradise, plush with turquoise beaches and cosmopolitan dining options. Then, indulge in a bespoke spa treatment at the onsite Sen Spa, enjoy a cocktail on the rooftop Blue Bar and dine on local cuisine at the romantic Indochine Restaurant.

hotels.title: Nha Trang Coastal Bliss with Three Swimming Pools
hotels.description: The buzzing beach town of Nha Trang offers the perfect combination of city living and coastal charms and is best enjoyed from the stylish InterContinental Nha Trang, an IHG Hotel. Enjoy superb views of the city's bay from this hotel, then visit the four bars and restaurants, including a poolside bar. Fill your days however you please: dive into one of three outdoor swimming pools or head to the day spa for a spot of pampering and unwinding.

hotels.title: Secluded Five-Star Vietnam Beachfront Luxury
hotels.description: Discover five-star beachfront bliss among the waves of Vietnam’s East Sea at Mia Resort Nha Trang, ranked in the top 1% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor. Sitting on a secluded private beach, nestled in the cliffs between Nha Trang and Cam Ranh, this remarkable resort delivers the ultimate in private luxury, with everything you’ll need onsite. Condos and villas at Mia Resort Nha Trang are designed with romance in mind, with equal amounts of indoor and outdoor space to explore. Dive into the waves of the private beach or spend your days poolside, flanked by sun loungers, palm trees and, further afield, Nha Trang's mountains. Find your zen with a morning yoga class before diving into deep relaxation at Xanh Spa, with tailormade treatments using ginger, coffee and lemongrass on offer. Try something new every night at the beachside Sandals Restaurant - weekly themed nights include pasta, seafood, Vietnamese and BBQ - or taste your way through the selection of cocktails at Mojito’s Lounge and Bar. If leaving your condo or villa seems too hard, ask the staff to pack a picnic to eat on your private terrace. Just 20 minutes from the closest international airport, Mia Resort Nha Trang is easy to access but incredibly hard to leave.

hotels.title: Beachfront Novotel Nha Trang Elegance with Tranquil Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Bask in the coastal charms of Nha Trang from this idyllic Novotel abode, perfectly positioned on the vibrant city's main road, offering easy access to the pristine beach. Unwind in style in the hotel's well-appointed rooms and relax in the glistening pool. As the sun dips below the horizon, replenish with scrumptious cocktails at the Pool Bar. When it's time to explore, the historic Ponagar Temple, the Long Son Pagoda and the bustling night market are within easy reach. For beach lovers, embark on an expedition across the crystal-clear waters and snorkel in the colourful reefs. After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel's In Balance Spa for a rejuvenating treatment.

seo.title: Hôtels à Nha Trang - Vietnam Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trouvez les meilleurs hôtels à Nha Trang, Vietnam avec des offres exclusives. Réservez votre escapade parfaite avec jusqu'à 60% de réduction.
